entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Ludo Bagman is a person who is present in the scene, helping with the Gaalleons for the funny wand. He is described as whipping out a notebook and quill to jot down the twins' names.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Barty Crouch is a person who is being looked for by Ludo Bagman. He is described as speaking over two hundred languages.

relationships.description: Ludo Bagman is looking for Barty Crouch, who can help him with a problem he is facing.
Barty Crouch will be able to sort out the difficulties that Ludo Bagman's Bulgarian opponent is making.
